snippet: Some analysts are questioning the link between risk and return, saying a low-volatility stock portfolio can produce returns as good as those of a high-volatility one.
abstract: Some analysts are questioning the inextricable link between risk and return, saying a low-volatility stock portfolio can produce returns as good as those of a high-volatility one; marketers, sensing a weary investing audience, have only recently rolled out low-volatility mutual funds.
lead_paragraph: Some analysts are questioning the link between risk and return, saying a low-volatility stock portfolio can produce returns as good as those of a high-volatility one.

headline.seo: Low-Volatility Funds Gain Fans in Unsettled Times
headline.main: In Search of Funds That Don’t Rock the Boat
headline.print_headline: In Search of Funds That Don’t Rock the Boat
